Rizopas had left before he was fired at, Diskus was slashed by Griplashes' =
blade, but no pain, he was in stasis lock...
  ----- Original Message -----=
 
  From: dcoburn 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, October 15, 20=
00 1:22 PM
  Subject: Coming To The Rescue, KS!!!


  ::Dark Lavacons::
   =

            The Dark Lavacons are now in the midst of a battle.  They had =
been needed by the Alliance to help fight Rage, but this battle was more im=
portant(Actually, anything involving war is most important, as long as it's=
 there and happening).
   
            Astral laughed his evil laugh, and f=
ired his dark flame rocket launcher at Jetstorm.
   
            Fenox land=
ed, and fired his dark heat optic lazers at Jetstorm.
   
            Reckl=
essa landed, pulled out her dark flame gatling guns and started opening mad=
 fire on Sharpedge.
   
            Griplash jumped down on the ground, and=
 came tearing at Diskus with his dark lava blade.
   
             Starligh=
t grabbed her dark flame crossbow.  She fired it off in one direction, and =
then the other, just for fun.
   
             Then she pointed straight at=
 Rizopas.
   
             "Kiss your waste disposal unit goodbye!!!!!" She=
 said, and fired.

        eGroups Sponsor
